howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our community research platform makes it easy to contribute to longevity science while tracking your own health data.

step1.title: Track Your Biomarkers
step1.description: Enter your health data securely and anonymously. Track changes over time and see how you compare to reference ranges.

step2.title: Join Research Projects
step2.description: Participate in community research projects that interest you. Your data is always anonymized and aggregated.

step3.title: See the Impact
step3.description: Access insights from community research and see how your contributions are advancing longevity science.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our community research platform.
faq.q1: Is my data secure and private?
faq.a1: Yes, all data is anonymized and encrypted. We never share individual data with third parties, and you can delete your data at any time.
faq.q2: What kind of biomarkers can I track?
faq.a2: You can track a wide range of biomarkers including blood markers, vitamins, lipids, hormones, and inflammation markers. We're constantly adding new categories based on community feedback.
faq.a3: Research projects are created by our scientific team in collaboration with academic researchers. Community members can also propose research questions that may become future projects.
faq.q4: Can I see my personal trends over time?
faq.a4: Yes, you can view charts and trends of your biomarkers over time, and compare them to community averages while maintaining anonymity.

cta.title: Join Our Research Community Today
cta.subtitle: Be part of something bigger. Help advance longevity science while tracking your own health journey.
